Text: Thank you for this, and all the great uploads of SH rugby.  I know that is your thing and not NH rugby, but do you know where someone could download that as well to keep up to date?

The JWC was awesome, but so was the Trophy tourney that promotes its winner up to this tourney.  Did you get the final of that one?  The irb says it was 'epic' and just wanted to see if true.  Japan vs Usa.
